short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that modifies the Udemy course page, displaying the time remaining after each section

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays for each course section and lecture, how much time is remaining to finalize the course.

Now the extension takes into consideration the user progress in order to display the remaining time in the course, so that in the event of the user not following the course in a linear manner, the extension will still display accurate information about the remaining time to complete the non-completed lectures.

Please bear in mind that Udemy's native interface natively rounds the estimated durations of the lectures, but this extensions calculates the remaining times based on the real accurate estimated durations (to the seconds) of the lectures as reported by Udemy's API. The extension can optionally show the real estimated duration of each lecture and section through the extension's settings.

The extension underwent a massive update in order to make it more functional. If you detect any issues with it please let us know in the email indicated at the Extension Details section below, so that we can address it.

Note: This extension doesn't work at the moment with Udemy for business,  it only supports regular Udemy.
